body: Hi, I was thinking about if is possible configure two EP constructions in a ExternalWall, for example, first, I have a beam + covering, and, above, I have an brick's wall. Detail: specifying the height of each EP construction. (See the picture) Another issue, when I tryed to add a window material (simple glass) to cover a ExternalWall (in cases of buildings completely covered of glass), the energyplus simulation give me an error. How to solve this? I just want to represent a construction like this [](http://api.ning.com/files/COTpG8VCG7QPp*3ms-xHxb43SoFJ6o*94vWVTYOkY3I4xDeM7Neb*eah2DpRxcIDhFXFtlX3E5QVDlCOlP9VUAXUhPxbIaBc/IMG_2405.JPG)
topic: How to insert more than one EP construction in a surface
